import React from 'react'; interface IntroScreenProps { onStart: () => void; onHelp: () => void; gameWidth: number; gameHeight: number; } export default function IntroScreen({ onStart, onHelp, gameWidth, gameHeight }: IntroScreenProps) { return (

Welcome to Hogwarts!

Fly through obstacles, defeat Witches with magic wand spells, and achieve the highest score!

); }
